Name: Monitor Girl | 监控姬
About the game: On February 11, 2022, it was newly upgraded, adding a variety of functions, such as hardware detection, creative workshop, etc., and retaining the previous version. I hope to reverse the previous evaluation, and I hope you can support it! New upgrade on February 11, 2022 1. Add hardware detection (CPU, GPU, ram, disk...) 2. Support steam workshops 3. Three sets of templates, diversified window monitoring Pendant Old Version Feature List 1. The younger sister swings her lower leg to help you monitor the PC on the video card. As the CPU temperature increases, the younger sister will change. 2. Identify CPU model, monitor CPU utilization rate and CPU temperature. 3. Identify the model of GPU, monitor the usage rate of GPU and monitor the temperature of GPU. 4. Monitor memory usage. 5. Monitor the utilization rate of hard disk space. 6. Display time.
